name: Plenish
description:
We harness the power of plants to make delicious and nutritious drinks made from high quality, sustainably-sourced ingredients with absolutely none of the junk that so many big brands put in their products. Our philosophy is simple - we make products that contain everything you need and nothing you don't. 

Our focus is on plant-based dairy alternatives that help all of us to reduce our environmental impact by making it simple (and super delicious) to consume more plants and less of the animal products that take such a huge toll on the planet. 

We sell our organic plant-based m*lks and cold-pressed juices in supermarkets and independent stores across the UK but the heart of our business is where we started - our direct-to-consumer e-commerce website plenishdrinks.com.

jobs.title: Data Scientist with BI Engineering Skills
jobs.description:
We are looking for an entrepreneurial, commercial, data and system savvy Data Scientist with BI Engineering Skills to join our growing team.  You will use your experience and skills to go into existing systems, create dashboards and generate actionable insights that you will then execute on, which may include coding and development work, for our e-commerce business.
 
You will build these systems and dashboards to harness insights from our direct to consumer channel and apply to other online marketplaces like Amazon and through performance marketing channels such as search, social media and CRM.  

Some of your main roles and responsibilities will be to:
 
-	Manage our online sales channels and identify commercial opportunities through data analysis
-	Optimise the on-site experience to increase revenue and conversion 
-	Optimise marketing spend to acquire new customers as effectively as possible
-	Build systems and develop segmentation that helps us understand our customers better
-	Create targeted customer journeys and email campaigns in partnership with our in-house content creators to improve customer satisfaction and retention
-	Analyse data from all channels and implement solutions to constantly improve our performance (inc. on-site, social media marketing, PPC, email marketing and more)
-	Improve operations for the whole online business, recommending improvements wherever you see opportunities
 
Your qualifications:
-	Degree in relevant field such a Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering
-	At least 2 years experience doing BI Engineering in a small business, ideally a start up and ready to step up to a Data Scientist role or already in a Data Science role.
-	An entrepreneurial attitude, with a strong desire to roll your sleeves up, dive into systems and data, create insights and start testing, learning and making improvements across our systems and domain.
-	An insatiable curiosity and desire to improve business processes not only in marketing and sales, but across all areas of the business that you recognise.
-	Experience in CRM systems like Klaviyo, Dot Mailer or similar.
-	Experience coding on e-commerce platforms like WooCommerce or similar.
-	Experience with performance marketing channels like Facebook and Google Ads.
-	Open mindedness to a Plant-Based Diet is a plus.
